title: Anybody to help me out
body: anyone willing to help carry me through bronze out there? I am a pretty good support also can play any other role. (just looking for someone of higher elo to help me out) currently in Bronze IV. add me (SlipperyMoose96)

replies.body: I could use the same help if you're interested. Juskillmealredy.

Well the fact that your play time is the same as gold players means that you have been d***ing around too much in league and not bothered in learning to get better. But it's never to late to start.....

SlipperyMoose96 it's all about experience, you played rank too early and that's why you are bronze. You should play some normals and aim to get 300 wins, and if your wins are less than your losses then just play until you have more wins than loss in normals after 300 wins. Your play time should of been at least 30 days to actually start climbing up the ladder and just like all of us we aren't fast learners like faker and we need time to grow. 
http://www.loltimeplayed.com/timeplayed.php?region=oce&summoner=slipperymoose96
